#cloud-config

users:
  - name: emulator
    gecos: Choria Emulator
    sudo: ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - "ssh-rsa  13_inch_mbp"
      - "ssh-rsa  rip@liberate"

runcmd:
  - "rpm -ivh http://yum.puppetlabs.com/puppet5/puppet-release-el-7.noarch.rpm"
  - "yum -y install puppet-agent puppetserver git"
  - "ln -s /opt/puppetlabs/bin/puppet /usr/bin/puppet"
  - "puppet resource host puppet ensure=present ip=127.0.0.1"
  - "echo '*' > /etc/puppetlabs/puppet/autosign.conf"
  - "echo role=puppet_master > /opt/puppetlabs/facter/facts.d/role.txt"
  - "/opt/puppetlabs/puppet/bin/gem install librarian-puppet --no-ri --no-rdoc"
  - "cd /tmp;git clone https://github.com/choria-io/choria-emulator.git"
  - "cp -fr /tmp/choria_emulator/ec2environment/puppet/* /etc/puppetlabs/code/environments/production/"
  - "cd /etc/puppetlabs/code/environments/production; /opt/puppetlabs/puppet/bin/librarian-puppet install --verbose"
  - "puppet config set --section main waitforcert 10"
  - "systemctl start puppetserver.service"
  - "systemctl start puppet.service"
